meta.description: KeepItFresh is an intelligent solution for restaurants that optimizes inventory management, temperature control, and customer service.

slogan.title: Optimize your restaurant with intelligence and freshness
slogan.desc: KeepItFresh is an intelligent solution that optimizes inventory management, temperature control, and customer service in restaurants.

about.title: Our Essence
about.desc: We are an intelligent solution that will optimize the management of restaurant inventories. In addition to allowing real-time tracking of products, thus avoiding food loss. An optimal solution that facilitates the customer service process by providing an easy and interactive tool.
about.mission_desc: To drive efficiency and sustainability in the restaurant industry through innovative technological solutions that optimize resource management and improve the customer experience.
about.vision_desc: To be the leading platform in intelligent solutions for restaurants globally, recognized for our ability to transform daily operations and contribute to a more sustainable future for the sector.
about.values_innovation: 1.Innovation: We constantly evolve with the gastronomic sector.

features.title: Features
features.track_desc: Monitor the status of products minute by minute to make quick and accurate decisions.
features.temperature_desc: Receive automatic alerts for any irregularities or when the expiration date is approaching.
features.alerts_desc: Easily control key conditions that affect inventory quality, such as temperature and storage time.
features.inventory_desc: Optimize your stock levels, reduce waste, and improve purchasing planning.
features.waiter_desc: A device that the customer presses to easily call the waiter.
